message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $175. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $175. How about we compromise at $190?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $180?
I'm not willing to go as low as $180, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $192?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $185?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $185. How about we try $195?
I'm getting close to giving up, but I really want this product. How about we meet at $187.50?
I'm willing to make one last compromise. How about we meet at $192.50?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still want to try to make a deal. How about we meet at $190?
